scripts.start: npm run start:mongodb && npm run start:redis && nx run-many --target=serve --projects=frontend,backend --parallel
scripts.start:mongodb: docker ps -q --filter 'name=dev-mongodb' | xargs -r docker stop && docker ps -aq --filter 'name=dev-mongodb' | xargs -r docker rm && docker run --rm -d --name dev-mongodb -p 27017:27017 -v $(pwd)/.mongodb:/data/db mongo:latest
scripts.start:redis: docker ps -q --filter 'name=dev-redis' | xargs -r docker stop && docker ps -aq --filter 'name=dev-redis' | xargs -r docker rm && docker run --rm -d --name dev-redis -p 6379:6379 -v $(pwd)/.redis:/data redis:latest
scripts.prod: npm run build && docker-compose down && npm run build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.clean: docker ps -aq | xargs -r docker stop && docker ps -aq | xargs -r docker rm && docker image prune -af && rm -rf node_modules dist .angular .nx .vscode .redis .mongodb package-lock.json
scripts.repair: npm run clean && docker image prune -af && npx npm-check-updates -u --reject tailwindcss && npm i --verbose
scripts.build: npx nx build frontend && npx nx build backend
